----------------------------------------------------------
WICED Application Framework Directory - README
----------------------------------------------------------

This directory contains applications that are part of the
WICED Application Framework.

Apps in this directory include:
  - bootloader   : Bootloader application used in conjunction with the WICED Application Framework
  - ota_upgrade  : Over-the-Air Upgrade Example Application
  - sflash_write : Serial flash library used to write serial flash for OTA & factory reset
